meta.title: From AUSTIN to POWERS
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Mao Reynolds
meta.message: A murder has been committed at our Halloween party! Seven witnesses (in costume) have given testimony, in the form of Raddles. Our second witness is the shagadelic Austin Powers, who offered up one piece of the solution. He's here to help, baby! [Update: the solution [can be found here](/mystery/whodunit)]

ladder.clue: Swap the vowels in <> to get some duties
Counterpart to <>, according to a famous saying
Add an E to <> and anagram to get a game company
Drop the first letter of <> and anagram to something you can flip
Drop the second letter of <> and anagram to get some fruit
Change the third letter of <> to a U and anagram to become remarkable
